    • changeRandomizedImage

      private void changeRandomizedImage​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView image, java.lang.String[] urlImages, java.lang.String baseImgURL, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane colorGrid, javafx.scene.control.Label category, int categoryIndex, boolean isGender)
      This method sums up the randomization of images for each category and its color.
      Parameters:
      image - of the category that is being changed.
      urlImages - of the images available. Selection to change them to.
      baseImgURL - original Image of that style to change its color.
      colorGrid - of the color selection from that category.
      category - label of the category.
      categoryIndex - current index of the category.
      isGender - whether or not that category is gender based.

    • backToMenu

      public void backToMenu()

    • hasAllowedName

      public boolean hasAllowedName()

    • getFilteredImage

      public java.awt.Image getFilteredImage​(java.awt.Image image, int redIncrement, int greenIncrement, int blueIncrement)
      This method will take current red, green and blue values of a java.awt.Image and adds the r g b shift values from the parameters as a filter on top of it.
      Parameters:
      image - that gets filtered.
      redIncrement - red shift.
      greenIncrement - green shift.
      blueIncrement - blue shift.
      Returns:
      image that has been filtered.

    • saveImageToFile

      public void saveImageToFile​(java.awt.Image image, java.lang.String type, java.lang.String dst)
      This method can save a Java.awt.Image into a file.
      Parameters:
      image - that is being turned into a file.
      type - format of the file.
      dst - destination of the file.

    • filterFxImage

      public javafx.scene.image.Image filterFxImage​(java.lang.String baseImageURL, java.awt.Color color, int width, int height) throws java.io.IOException
      This method will filter a given JavaFX Image with the given color values.
      Parameters:
      baseImageURL - of resource that is being filtered.
      color - of the rgb values.
      Returns:
      JavaFX Image.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if File doesn't exists

    • addSlideShowClickListeners

      public void addSlideShowClickListeners​(int index, javafx.scene.control.Button rButton, javafx.scene.control.Button lButton, java.lang.String[] slidingImages, javafx.scene.image.ImageView choosingImageView, javafx.scene.layout.GridPane colorGrid, javafx.scene.control.Label categoryLabel)
      This method will add clickListeners to the buttons > and < beside the style Images, so they can be clicked through.
      Parameters:
      index - of sliderPosition from a certain category.
      rButton - sliding through a category style to the right direction.
      lButton - sliding through a category style to the left direction.
      slidingImages - styles of a certain category (hair 1, hair 2, ...)
      choosingImageView - base ImageView of a categoryLayer that is being manipulated.
      categoryLabel - Label that represents number of a style (hair 1, hair 2, hair 3...) for the user.

    • addColorListeners

      private void addColorListeners​(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane colorGrid, javafx.scene.image.ImageView choosingImageView, java.lang.String[] slidingImages, javafx.scene.control.Label categoryLabel)
      This method will add clickListeners to the colors of each category and manipulates that category layer with an RGBFilter.
      Parameters:
      colorGrid - colors of the category.
      choosingImageView - ImageView that is being changed once the color changes.
      slidingImages - All possible Images of a category (short hair, long hair...).
      categoryLabel - Label that represents number of a style (hair 1, hair 2, hair 3...) for the user.

    • addColorListeners

      private void addColorListeners​(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane colorGrid, java.lang.String baseImgURL, javafx.scene.image.ImageView choosingImageView)
      This method will add clickListeners to the colors of each category and manipulates that category layer with an RGBFilter.
      Parameters:
      colorGrid - colors of the category.
      choosingImageView - ImageView that is being changed once the color changes.
